author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL FROM OSCAR CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN CUBA  AND THE SOUTHEASTERN BAHAMAS...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL FROM OSCAR CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN CUBA  AND THE SOUTHEASTERN BAHAMAS...
 As of 8:00 PM EDT Mon Oct 21
 the center of Oscar was located near 21.4, -75.7
 with movement NNE at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Oscar (AT1/AL162024)
